text: By the end of the month he still delighted in Naples. He told Cloncurry that he out fast.... What a gay, lively people, and what a busy town. At Rome, every other man was a priest: here the priest is superceded by the soldier - a favourable change in my eye, particularly as the troops are very fine.
handwritten_text: By the end of the month he still delighted in Naples. He told Cloncurry that he out fast.... What a gay, lively people, and what a busy town. At Rome, every other man was a priest: here the priest is superceded by the soldier - a favourable change in my eye, particularly as the troops are very fine.
